CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 4, 1947, pg. 4, reads: "Holiday Sparkle is in the Air - Pretty women took the center of the stage in Pittsburgh during the holiday season, and here Courier Cameraman Teenie Harris went here and there to snap some of the best-lookers for you. Left photo: At the William Lampkins handsome cocktail party for the James Ducketts and the Jack Smiths was this trio of youthful charm, including Mrs. Katheryn [Katharyne] Irvis, Mrs. Romaine Childs and Mrs. Helen Phillips Horton of Alton, Ill., who was been visiting her family here..."
TitMainTitle: Katharyne "Kitten" Irvis, Romaine Childs, and Helen Phillips Horton wearing long gowns at home of William Lampkin for holiday party
